original_title: Hide 'em in Your Heart: 13 Bible Memory Music Videos for Children of All Ages
overview: Practical application of God's Word is a valuable lifelong skill. These "video illustrations" will teach the relevance of Scripture in a child's world.
tagline: 13 Bible Memory Music Videos for Children of All Ages
title: Hide 'em in Your Heart: 13 Bible Memory Music Videos for Children of All Ages
